import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import {connect} from 'unistore/react' import {actions} from '../store'; class Detail extends Component { componentDidMount = async () => { await this.props.getDetailProduct() } render() { return (

{this.props.item_detail.item_name}

Rp.{this.props.item_detail.price}

{this.props.item_detail.description}

Size : {item_detail.size}

Color : {item_detail.color}

Store : {item_detail.posted_by}

Add to Cart

); } } export default connect( "item_detail, id", actions )(withRouter(Detail));
